## NoConnectionInterceptor class

NoConnectionInterceptor used for intercepting http responses and handling 0 statuses

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NoConnectionInterceptor implements HttpInterceptor 
```
<b>Implements:</b> HttpInterceptor
